title: Seattle City Council Transportation & Utilities Committee 8/19/2020
description:
View the City of Seattle's commenting policy: seattle.gov/online-comment-policy

In-person attendance is currently prohibited per Washington State Governor's Proclamation No. 20-28.8 through September 1, 2020. Meeting participation is limited to access by telephone conference line and Seattle Channel online. 

Agenda: Chair's Report; Public Comment; Appointments to the Seattle School Traffic Safety Committee, Seattle Pedestrian Advisory Board; CB 119858: relating to the financing of the West Seattle Bridge Immediate Response project; CB 119865: relating to street and sidewalk use; CB 119867: relating to the City's traffic code; CB 119868: relating to use of City right-of-way by free-floating scooters; CB 119745: University of Washington pedestrian skybridges; CB 119866: relating to Seattle Public Utilities. 

Advance to a specific part
Public Comment - 1:23
Appointments and Reappointments to the Seattle School Traffic Safety Committee, Seattle Pedestrian Advisory Board - 18:44
CB 119858: relating to the financing of the West Seattle Bridge Immediate Response project - 39:10
CB 119865: relating to street and sidewalk use - 1:35:06
CB 119867: relating to the City's traffic code and CB 119868: relating to use of City right-of-way by free-floating scooters - 1:54:14
CB 119745: University of Washington pedestrian skybridges - 3:35:50
CB 119866: relating to Seattle Public Utilities - 3:43:24
